summary: This bill, H.R. 1823, mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs and the Comptroller General to investigate funding shortfalls within the Department of Veterans Affairs. It requires a review of the Veterans Benefits Administration's 2024 shortfall and the projected 2025 shortfall for the Veterans Health Administration. The Comptroller General must report findings, including reasons for discrepancies in spending plans and recommended remedial actions. The Secretary of Veterans Affairs then submits this report to relevant congressional committees.
